title: Marakkar: Lion of the Arabian Sea
occurrences: Marakkar has to agree, right?
Is it Kuttyali Marakkar or Raja Keshava varma, who's ruling Kochi?
I was about to send someone to ask you to come here, Marakkar.
A wedding is going to happen in the Marakkar family.
Marakkar, the...?
Marakkar...
You needn't come here again to talk about this, Marakkar.
And his younger brother, this pattu Marakkar.
The traders are all standing united with Kuttyali Marakkar.
It was the senior Marakkar, who took out the sword first...
The guards are saying that mammali and pattu Marakkar are absconding.
You are the senior Marakkar now.
Pokkerali died on Kuttyali Marakkar's lap,
When I think about hoisting the Zamorin flag along with pattu Marakkar that day,
Pattu Marakkar!
Kunjali Marakkar, the fourth, who stands before you now.
I am declaring Kunjali Marakkar as the commander of our Navy.
...and hand over his royal sword to Kunjali Marakkar.
I honour Kunjali Marakkar with the position of the commander of our Navy.
...do you remember killing and burning down an elderly Marakkar and family?
Kunjali Marakkar has been dismissed from the position of the commander.
...of Kunjali Marakkar forever.
They have decided to start a combined attack against Kunjali Marakkar.
I hereby pronounce, Mohammed Ali Marakkar...
...alias Kunjali Marakkar...
But, if Marakkar pleads guilty of his accusations,
...Kunjali Marakkar to death..
regex: \b((?!\bMarakkar:)Marakkar|(?!\bLion\ of\ the\ Arabian\ Sea:)Lion\ of\ the\ Arabian\ Sea)(?!\:)(?!'t)\b
